pr_title: chore(gateway): prevent exceptions on already cancelled calls

timeline.message:
chore(gateway): prevent exceptions on already cancelled calls

- adds a check in the long polling request context to avoid completing
  cancelled requests
- prevents throwing an exception on cancelled calls and instead log it
  at TRACE level

timeline.bodyText: Could we somehow reuse the method sendRequest, i dont like this duplication.
timeline.author: Zelldon

timeline.message: chore(gateway): extract helper method to reduce duplication

timeline.bodyText: What happend before without the handler again? Sorry 😅
timeline.author: Zelldon
